## Rtools on Windows

You need [Rtools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/) to build the package on Windows. The package includes C++, so needs the compiler toolchain. Check for package build problems using the `pkgbuild` package.
```{r eval=FALSE}
pkgbuild::check_build_tools(debug = TRUE)
```
